website_summaries.verdict: Offers lots of fast-paced fun that will keep youngsters occupied with its features and make parents happy with the price.
pros: This action-packed set offers hours of affordable fun capable of launching cars and side-by-side racing
Features a checkered racing flag and grandstand characters that are activated by lapping cars
cons: Parts of the track occasionally come disconnected during rough play

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy - Bad Parts
customer_reviews.text: This junk is discontinued, probably because of issues like the attached photo. The track cannot be assembled because the connecting piece is upsidedown.
customer_reviews.author: MommyPoo

customer_reviews.title: Its a good toy the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Its a good toy the kids love it. Pros: Easy to put together Engages kids they play for a long time Cons: It's LOUD you have to bang down to launch the cars, it's LOUD! The thing that pops out will get lost easily Overall: Its worth it since the kids love it and it can be used with other track systems to expand tracks. there is also a way to bypass the turn which is cool so you can use this as just a launcher.
customer_reviews.author: ASANA

customer_reviews.title: Be creative
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for our 4 year old and its been one of his "go to" toys ever since. Be creative. We typically don't set it up like Hot Wheels intended. We add tracks and create our own jumps and send cars all over the place. Its a blast. The 9 year old girl and mom love it too. We haven't found too many cars that wont work with it. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Historicus

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our youngest grandson who is just getting into Hot Wheels. He really enjoyed it. Just make sure to get another small car for racing. It only comes with one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan's Sunny Days

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: The cars fall off the track. Plastic is thin and wiggly. The winner tabs don't always pop out. Very frustrating for boys ages 5-8. Don't waste your money. After two days of trying to play with it, even I gave up. It went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old and surpingsly 1 year old love this toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and surpingsly 1 year old love this toy. The only thing that is very annoying about it is you constantly have to re-attach the Orange track because it comes loose at the connection point. Pretty flimsy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: txsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Eh, it but falls apart often and is kind of a pain to put back together. The only reason I gave it 3 stars was because my son really liked it, in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Losing weight

customer_reviews.title: Fun...while it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is basic. Nothing crazy. Pieces that shoot up don't always pop when the car goes by. Not much to it. The kids end up smashing on the trigger pretty good, but the durability doesnt hold up after a short while. Not a terrible product, but dont expect the gift of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Polansky

customer_reviews.title: No Track Sections Included
customer_reviews.text: All this is is the blue loop section. It "connects to other Hot Wheels track (not included)." For the price, they could include 2-4 sections of straight track to make it a functional toy of itself. Luckily I happened to have some here or the little girl would have been very frustrated at a half toy. It's cheaply made, and the instructions are difficult if you need reading glasses, and start with, "Flip the track over." From which side to which?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Z. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work to well
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the pieces to stay in the clip without them popping back out by themselves. Then the others take forever to pop out. Plus not to many of his hot wheels will fit in the chamber. It just wasn't what I thought it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy and doesn’t stay together
customer_reviews.text: Broke Easley. Hard to keep it together. It’s in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jreshow

customer_reviews.title: Hot wheels super race
customer_reviews.text: Got this race way for grandsons ( I also bought a 50 pc set of hot wheels to go with). My niece put it together in a just a few minutes. You "hit" the posts on the end and they race around and pieces on the other end pop off. I think they are going to love it. I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: My Nephew Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it. We bought it so we'd have some stuff for him to play with already at our house when he came to visit or sleep over. He might be a slight bit young for it because he really bangs on the thing to send the cars up the ramps. The pieces that you "knock off" sometimes don't easily pop back into their slots, resulting in several attempts to reseat them. But it's all good. My next step is to get some extra track because you can attach more to the underside and the ramp lifts up revealing a "secret" exit. All in all, we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hechler

customer_reviews.title: Great race track.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool beginner set for a kid who loves cars. Bought it for my 2-years old, soon to be 3-yrs old nephew. He has a ball shooting the cars up and making the tabs pop up at the top. We bought him the 20 pack of Hot Wheel cars to accompany it. You can only put the flat top cars in there. No trucks (they'll get stuck). We give him a few cars to play with in moderation because all 20 will be everywhere, or he'll take them all home and have none to play with when he visits. Lol
customer_reviews.author: calmedcooled

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed on this hot wheels track. My SON absolutely loves it BUT we haven't had it for 2 whole weeks yet. He has played with it every other day. But the blue attachment (joiner) under it that keeps the orange tracks attached to the main body of the toy are very weak. and weakening as he plays with it. The blue joiners are very close to BREAK! and it's slightly unattaching from the gray main body of the toy ( gray piece ).
customer_reviews.author: bp-richards

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Glitches, but a Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: I finally worked around the assembly problem I encountered with a little disassembly first, at my own risk. Once the pieces were correctly in place, the track worked great and seems to have a lot of fun elements. Can't wait for my grandson to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old birthday
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son 3 weeks ago for his birthday, and he picked up the ability to play right away. He loves challenging me (dad) and is actually pretty good. Not all hotwheels cars perform well in this, but that is part of the fun finding the ones that do work and work well. Was a great present for him, he probably could have started playing with it a few months sooner if you're worried whether a 2 year old would get enjoyment out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5-year old grandson as he loves hot wheels! This was a great price. You can race 2 cars at the same time and hit flags that pop up in the air. There are also small trap doors in the tracks, before the cars start the loop, that we attached additional hot wheels tracks to which my grandson loves! It's easy to assemble and disassemble for storage. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay assembled
customer_reviews.text: Only if it would stay assembled. The ramp will not stay attached, so you have to put the ramp in almost each time you eject the car.
customer_reviews.author: Lakisha Perkins-Lu

customer_reviews.title: Fast Hot Wheels
customer_reviews.text: It was fun. Cars go super fast and mostly stay on the track. You have crash scenes too at times, and other cars may just win. The track set does come with a hot wheel, and not all cars will work on the track so you can do a trial-n-error test for more racing car options.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: The birthday boy loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for a boy in my son's kindergarten class. He loved it! His mom said it was the first gift he played with when the party was over. That sounds like a win!
customer_reviews.author: K Abello

customer_reviews.title: Not even a joke as a toy.
customer_reviews.text: The cars that goes on often goes off the rail. The rail is very badly designed and made of cheap plastic. It became unusable on day 2 after when we were trying to clean up the play area then the rail thing folded when we lift it up. It is pretty sad... they just want to sell more diecast cars.
customer_reviews.author: Sean's Amazon Account

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for our grandson. Difficult to put together. Not the most durable item we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: T Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Design
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all the complaints were this toy kept a smile on 4 yr old grandson. Daughter and her son loved the gift too! Love the belly retrieval area and how well this stood up. I bought this and a hot wheel race track and both were equally a hit! Yes, Grandma scored big!
customer_reviews.author: Evenengle

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick play time
customer_reviews.text: If you have a child that is all about racing then this is a cool toy. Easy to put together and durable. Would of gave it a 5 star however our son gets bored with it very easily since it’s the same repetitive motion and not much imagination to it. Plus the small parts are easily lost.
customer_reviews.author: EZ Sol

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is just cheap plastic junk. No need to buy it. Shoddy construction means it rarely works as it should. It will fall apart soon too. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: bmcavan

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves it. For the price I was expecting much better quality. Guess your pretty much paying for the brand name since it’s just a bunch of cheap plastic pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Niki P

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old Grandson LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy for my son to put together and then my 4 year old Grandson played with it for at least 15 minutes without stoping. And then during the next 3 hours went back several times for more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Hot, Hot Hot
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson has more hot wheel s then you can count and so getting a super speedway, where he can play with all of them either by himself or with his friends and cousins, is an extra special treat. He said they were his best presents & his best birthday ever. (He's 4). A very grown up 4 yr. old. He's the one that said it was "Hot, Hot, Hot "
customer_reviews.author: veda klein

customer_reviews.title: Portable Fun for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a middle child (boy) but his sisters enjoyed playing with it too. Dad had to help assemble but after that it was off to the races. Mom and Dad appreciated it too, and even brought it along on a family trip for the kid cousins to enjoy for playtime.
customer_reviews.author: m1tommy

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two year old’s bday bc he loves cars. He’s not super interested, but my 4 year old LOVES it. Also easy to put together. Use regular size/weight cars. Larger/heavier specialty cars don’t work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter for 3 to 4 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good at first. My 3 year old can use on his own. Overall I am not too impressed by the durability and that it is not compatible with more of the cars. Good value for the price but I wish it was more usable.
customer_reviews.author: Bellasaurusrex

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, but fun times
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it, it was fun to play with, but not very safe if you get aggressive (at times the car leaves the track at high speed). The flags don't get triggered correctly all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Fit4life

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it...
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter both love this. Mom and dad even joined in to the racing competition. This is great gift or way to entertain your little ones for a while. Assembly was rather easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Blake

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt to happy with how flimsy the track was and how we have to keep pushing it back together after each car passes on it . Cant return it because my grandbabies plays with it and doesnt seem to mind they have to put back together all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris kni

customer_reviews.title: Fun track
customer_reviews.text: This would get 5 stars if it came with two cars rather than just one. Why would they make a two-track set and only include one car??? Anyway I had to buy a set of cars so my grandson would be able to play on this track with another person as it was intended.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The package was sealed but the track was missing critical parts for assembly. The connectors needed to attach the tracks to the roundabout were missing. I had to use cardboard and tape so the kids could play with it after opening it for Christmas. The support stands for the middle of the tracks were also missing. The kids are having fun with it, but the temporary fix won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our grandson (3 yrs old) for Christmas, he loves it. Was easy to assemble, he and his 7 year old sister have a ball playing with it. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ShortStuff

customer_reviews.title: Great concept only ok execution
customer_reviews.text: Unit is kind of flimsy and connection between the track and circle housing easily bends or comes apart. Also takes a bit of strength to really get the car going. Easy for a young child to miss and make the car ether not really go enough to circle the track or make their hand sore.
customer_reviews.author: PC_Rick

customer_reviews.title: Fun but loud
customer_reviews.text: This track is fun but pretty loud and the functionality is pretty limited. You are also limited by car size so don’t expect it to work with all hot wheels cars.
customer_reviews.author: The_Upshaws

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 7 year old and he put it together himself in no time at all. It's kid-powered, no batteries required. Huge hit for a real Hot Wheels fan.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons love this toy. (ages three and four)
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be indestructible! They like to whack the actuator with their fists. They have gotten hours of entertainment from this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: This is OK. Too many parts. Tries to do too many things (launches signs when the car goes around). It is OK, but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This launches the cars well and my 2 and 4 year old can both do it independently.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Herring

customer_reviews.title: Hot wheels track
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for grandson! He loves Hot Wheels anything! He put it together and played with it for hours on Christmas Day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Move on
customer_reviews.text: It’s not that this toy isn’t fun, it’s just a little boring, to be honest. My son is pretty easily made happy with anything hot wheels related but this just wasn’t worth the money or the space it takes up on the floor. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my 12 year old. He's been adding onto the track too. He loves having contests with his cars.
customer_reviews.author: EBeautySue

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son has gotten into hot wheels and lives this. His older 10 year old sister had fun playing with it too. My
customer_reviews.author: Laduga

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and kids love it! They cars crash into the crowd pieces when they hit the back of the loop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old nephew for his birthday!!!! He loved it, it was his favorite gift!!! Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Mary Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Fun for our little boy but louder than expected. The “signs” at the top of the track shoot off when the cars race which makes for more noise than expected. It’s a fun track for one or two to play with though so overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LRo26

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Boys Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my close friends twins birthday present. The boys loved it so much !! They all played with the track on and off during our entire visit. Now I need to buy this for my son. Great awesome track!! Best played in pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea E. Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a 4 Year Old Boy
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my 4 year old nephew for Christmas. Together with a separate pack of 9 more Hot Wheels, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old grandson. We put it together and he really likes it. He has a sister so it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: B. McK

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for everyone together.
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my grandkids. They stretched it out accross our family room and had cars racing all around. What great fun for all of us
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels Blastway Track
customer_reviews.text: Great as gift for boys and girls! Got this for my son to play with his son who has a lot of hot wheel cars.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Willie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great grandson, he and his father love it! Easy to assemble and it’s a fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Leavenworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fun product...
customer_reviews.text: This Hot Wheel item was purchased for my 7 year old grandson. It was easy to put together and fun for all to use. Item was a good buy....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold up well to a 4-yr olds wear and tear. Takes an older child or adult to assemble properly.
customer_reviews.author: MrBCaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart constantly. Loud & not as cool as we thought it would be. 4 year old loved it for like 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren simmonds

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old recieved for Christmas. It was a huge hit for her and her teenage cousins! We bought a 9 pack of cars in addition so everyone could "race".
customer_reviews.author: lexican

customer_reviews.title: I had Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. Assembles quickly and is sturdy. I even played. Lots of fun!!!

customer_reviews.title: Blast
customer_reviews.text: Directions could be a bit clearer. After it was assembled my boys ages 6 & 8 absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dawley

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's. Christmas gifts, needless to say he hasn't stop playng with it. Matter of fact it's in the middle of my bedroom floor now, where majority of his toys can be found.
customer_reviews.author: kia

customer_reviews.title: Nice track
customer_reviews.text: I really like this track set and so does my son. I gave it four stars because the track is a little flimsy and comes loose.
customer_reviews.author: Soniya

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew and they have it in the second floor playroom. It is super noisy! But the kids all loved playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults loved this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a favorite gift at Christmas, the cars shoot out quickly and the pop out plastic thingys work well, and make it exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: No batteries is the best part! our son loves slamming the ends down to make the cars go up the track. Noisy but that's all part of the fun.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had fun playing with it once we got it assembled
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D. Normandin

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Hot Wheels track, grandson loved it. Simple to put together
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old Grandson loved the gift. Nicely priced.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. Loud but great fun for kids. Parts fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped quickly and arrived in excellent condition. Our grandchildren will certainly enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Goodhew

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Works well and my daughter loved getting it for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The flags pop out every time. I’m not sure what the point of that is but I put the flags up and kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: son loved it
customer_reviews.text: loved the product only fault was it doesn't stay together
customer_reviews.author: jessica sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Race against each other
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it. We have races with this. 😍
customer_reviews.author: diane heidrich

customer_reviews.title: This one was ok...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little aggravating to assemble and did not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: melissa corpening

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great you for my two boys. Makes it easy for them both to be able to play cars together and not have to fight over who has what.
customer_reviews.author: vonzipper04

customer_reviews.title: Box had big hole upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: First - the box had a big hole in it,(not the shipping box, but the actual toy box) not that my grandson would care, but knowing that someone shipped it that way was a bit disappointing. Secondly, the item itself was made so cheaply and being a "race" type of track and the whole point of playing with it, it really should have come with 2 cars.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mikkola

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner hot wheel racers
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year olds really like this but it doesn’t hold their attention real long. But since they have a bunch of hot wheel cars, they do like seeing which ones race better. I like that it doesn’t use batteries and that you can extend the track easily.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Allen

customer_reviews.title: Durable and FUN
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this track, as does his sister. Durable, and assembly process provided some bonding time between Grandpa and grandson.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not fun
customer_reviews.text: The toy doesn't work as described. My grand children don't spend any time with it. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Not fun at all!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had not bought this, this toy is not fun at all.

customer_reviews.title: Fun track set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 5 year old son. So, far he has loved it.

customer_reviews.title: rating and reviews on an item
customer_reviews.text: grandkids love it ,easy to assemble and put away. Keeps them busy.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old liked it... used it to race the 2yr old... fun and easy to build. Total boy toy

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Product very good for kids wanting trucks and cars. They are safe and durable lasts a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Made a great Christmas gift for my son he was excited to get it set up to play with it

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for little ones who love cars :)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, son loves it, cars go so fast !!

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son (5) and anyone he happens to play with love this toy. Great purchase and is holding up with lots of use.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids busy.
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy. Does what it's supposed to. Easy assembly. Over all we are happy :)

customer_reviews.title: fun game for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Simple game easy to put together.Goal ,be the first to knock out all 3 yellow pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Fun for 3 and 6 yr old brothers. No skill needed to play.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid and niece love this toy. Also, help me as a parent to teach your son to share.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, good gift for others
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my friend’s kids. They loved smashing the triggers down to launch the cars. Made for a loud evening, but all good because I got to leave at the end of the night. Great gift for others 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mandi M. Bennington

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty fun. Easy enough to set up for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty fun. Easy enough to set up for a few quick races and breaks down compact enough to put out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and his father banged away on this Christmas morning for hours and I held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered later than stated , but everything else as described.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, my 3 year old loves it. Didn’t deliver in time.
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool! My 2 year old and all his cousin's and friends love it! Even the cat loved it LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Marinello

product_meta.title: Hot Wheels Super Speed Blastway Dual Track Racing Ages 6 and older
product_meta.description: Style:Super Speed BlastwayWho has the skills and the speed to cross the finish line first Kids send their Hot Wheels cars flying on the Super Speed Blastway and build their sportsmanship with competitive action to see who will be the ultimate champion. The finish flag decides who won the race! Drivers launch up towards the grandstands so fast, they knock off the pit crew one at a time with every lap until the car in the lead activates the checkered flag for victory. Kids will love the side-by-side racing action with two kid-activated slam launchers. Grandstands feature pop off characters activated by every completed lap around the speedway. Finish flag appears at the end of the race to reward the winner! Connects to other Hot Wheels track sets so kids can continue to rev their creativity and build an entire world of racing thrills. Each sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Two kid-activated slam launchers get the race started
Pop-off characters in grandstands activated by each lap cars complete
Checkered finish flag appears to reveal the ultimate racing champ
Connects to other Hot Wheels track sets for even more racing adventures

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,425 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
